name: Alice, the Valkyrie of Fairy Tales
text:
When this card enters your field, search your main deck a for Fairy Tale resonator, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck.
Counters on Fairy Tales you control cannot be removed by effects.
God's Art <Leaping Dance> U1. If you do, copy this ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Play God's Art <Leaping Dance> only once per game.)
set: The Seven Kings of the Lands
